sentences.english: This is achieved because barrows only come into play when you loose possession.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲向後拉線僅在你丟掉控球權時開始起作用。

sentences.english: Will you excuse me for awhile?It is about 5minutes.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，我要權時離開一下，約莫是5分鐘時間。

sentences.english: The right of set-off is exercised by notice to the other party.
sentences.chinese: 行使抵銷權時，應該通知另一方當事人。

sentences.english: When having acquired the hypothecation according to law, the endorsee may exercise the rights to the draft.
sentences.chinese: 被背書人依法實現其質權時，可以行使匯票權利。
